casebody.data:
Petition of RED STAR TOWING & TRANSPORTATION CO.* THE BRONX. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 7, 1929. No. 61. Burlingham, Veeder, Masten & Fearey, of New York City (Chauncey I. Clark and P. Fearson Shortridge, both of New York City, of counsel), for petitioner. Alexander & Ash, of New York City (Edward Ash, of New York City, of counsel), for appellees.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

Certiorari denied 49 S. Ct. 265, 73 L. Ed. —-.

 PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
